verses.verse: Again the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>'When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6381>makes<s%> a <S%H6381>special<s%> <S%H5087>vow,<s%> the <S%H5088>vow<s%> of a <S%H5139>Nazirite,<s%> to <S%H9320>dedicate<s%> himself to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%>

he shall <S%H9320>abstain<s%> from <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink;<s%> he shall <S%H7941>drink<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2558>vinegar,<s%> whether made from <S%H3196>wine<s%> or <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H8354>drink,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H6025>grape<s%> <S%H4952>juice,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3892>fresh<s%> or <S%H3002>dried<s%> <S%H6025>grapes.<s%>

<S%H3605>'All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> he shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>anything<s%> <S%H3605><s%> that is <S%H6213>produced<s%> by the <S%H3196>grape<s%> <S%H1612>vine,<s%> from [the] <S%H2785>seeds<s%> even to [the] <S%H2085>skin.<s%>

<S%H3605>'All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5088>vow<s%> of <S%H5145>separation<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8593>razor<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H7218>head.<s%> He shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> for <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H9320>separated<s%> himself to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> he shall let the <S%H6545>locks<s%> of <S%H8181>hair<s%> on his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H1431>grow<s%> <S%H1431>long.<s%>
<S%H3605>'All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H9320>separation<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> he shall not <S%H935>go<s%> near to a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>person.<s%>

'He shall not <S%H2930>make<s%> himself <S%H2930>unclean<s%> for his father or for his <S%H1>mother,<s%> for his <S%H517>brother<s%> or for his <S%H251>sister,<s%> when they <S%H269>die,<s%> <S%H4194>because<s%> his <S%H3588>separation<s%> to <S%H5145>God<s%> is on his <S%H430>head.<s%>
<S%H3605>'All<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> he is <S%H6918>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'But <S%H3588>if<s%> a man <S%H4191>dies<s%> <S%H6621>very<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> <S%H5921>beside<s%> him and he <S%H2930>defiles<s%> his <S%H5145>dedicated<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> [of hair,] then he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he <S%H2893>becomes<s%> <S%H2893>clean;<s%> he shall <S%H1548>shave<s%> it on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8449>turtledoves<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H3123>pigeons<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> to the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and [the] <S%H259>other<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him <S%H4480>concerning<s%> <S%H834><s%> his <S%H2398>sin<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of the [dead] <S%H5315>person.<s%> And that <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he shall <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%>

and shall <S%H9320>dedicate<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> his <S%H3117>days<s%> as a <S%H5145>Nazirite,<s%> and shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> for a <S%H817>guilt<s%> <S%H817>offering;<s%> but the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall be <S%H5307>void<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H5145>separation<s%> was <S%H2930>defiled.<s%>

'Now <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> <S%H3117>when<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation<s%> are <S%H4390>fulfilled,<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the offering to the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H7126>present<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord:<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> ewe-lamb a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1323>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect<s%> for a <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offering,<s%>

and a <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafers<s%> <S%H4886>spread<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> along with their grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>libations.<s%>

'Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7126>present<s%> [them] <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> his <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and his <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

'He shall also <S%H6213>offer<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H5921>together<s%> with the <S%H5536>basket<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>cakes;<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall likewise <S%H6213>offer<s%> its grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and its <S%H5262>libation.<s%>

'The <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> shall then <S%H1548>shave<s%> his <S%H5145>dedicated<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> [of <S%H8181>hair<s%>] at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H5145>dedicated<s%> hair of his <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> [it] on the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the ram's <S%H2220>shoulder<s%> [when it has been] <S%H1311>boiled,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%> out of the <S%H5536>basket,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>wafer,<s%> and shall <S%H5414>put<s%> [them] on the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> he has <S%H1548>shaved<s%> his <S%H5145>dedicated<s%> [hair].

'Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> them for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> It is <S%H6944>holy<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H5921>together<s%> with the <S%H2373>breast<s%> <S%H8573>offered<s%> by <S%H8573>waving<s%> and the <S%H7785>thigh<s%> <S%H8641>offered<s%> by <S%H8641>lifting<s%> up; and <S%H310>afterward<s%> the <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> may <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine.<s%> '

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5087>vows<s%> his <S%H7133>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to his <S%H5145>separation,<s%> in <S%H4480>addition<s%> <S%H905><s%> to <S%H834>what<s%> [else] he can <S%H5381>afford<s%><S%H3027>;<s%> according to his <S%H5087>vow<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5087>takes,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H8451>law<s%> of his <S%H5145>separation.<s%>"
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> you shall <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> You shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them:
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> you;
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H215>make<s%> His <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H215>shine<s%> on you, And be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to you;
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up His <S%H6440>countenance<s%> on you, And <S%H7760>give<s%> you <S%H7965>peace.<s%>'
"So they shall <S%H7760>invoke<s%> My <S%H8034>name<s%> on the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and I then will <S%H1288>bless<s%> them."
